name: fitr
body:
The `fitr` package is a tool for fitting reinforcement learning models to behavioural data. 

It is currently in early stages of development, and __only the Matlab package is functional at the moment__. 

I am working on the python and Julia packages, but improving the quality of the Matlab version is currently my main priority. 

Future updates will include:

* Documentation
* Built-in gradient computations for common models
* Expanding base of built-in tasks
* Improving speed by fitting subjects in parallel
* Exploring GPU-acceleration
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
